mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cia_shop (shop_name, shop_category, shop_num, shop_addr1, shop_addr2) VALUES(#{shopName}, #{shopCategory}, #{shopNum}, #{shopAddr1}, #{shopAddr2})
INSERT INTO cia_ceo_info (ceo_id, ceo_email, ceo_pw, ceo_name, ceo_phone, shop_name) VALUES(#{ceoId}, #{ceoEmail}, #{ceoPw}, #{ceoName}, #{ceoPhone}, #{shopName})
mapper.select: SELECT ceo_id, ceo_email, ceo_name, ceo_phone, ceo_regdate, c.shop_name, s.shop_name, s.shop_category, s.shop_num, s.shop_info, s.shop_addr1, s.shop_addr2 FROM cia_ceo_info c LEFT OUTER JOIN cia_shop s ON c.shop_name = s.shop_name WHERE c.ceo_id = #{ceoId}
